verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Sweetest note in seraph song, newline Sweetest name on mortal tongue, newline Sweetest carol ever sung, newline Jesus, blessed Jesus.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The great Physician now is near, newline The sympathizing Jesus. newline He speaks the drooping heart to cheer. newline O hear the voice of Jesus!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Your many sins are all forgiven, newline O hear the voice of Jesus! newline Go on your way, newline In peace to heaven, newline And wear a crown with Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All glory to the dying Lamb, newline I now believe in Jesus. newline I love the blessed Savior's name; newline I love the name of Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And when to that bright world above newline We rise to be with Jesus, newline We'll sing around the throne of love newline His name, the name of Jesus.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: His name dispels my guilt and fear, newline No other name but Jesus; newline O how my soul delights to hear newline The precious name of Jesus.
